head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MADISON, WILLIAM A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MADISON, WILLIAM A.

block.p: MADISON--William A., 86, on March 18, 2006. Husband of Anastasia and the late Claire Madison. Father of Deborah M. Nolan, William H., Thomas B.and Christopher K. Madison. Grandfather of Emily, Jessica, Frank, Bennett, William, Sarah, Nora, Lucy, Samuel, Magdalene, Devon, Claire and Avery and greatgrandfather of Aidan. Brother of the late Bert, Edna and Mildred. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave, at 81 St, Tuesday, 2-5 and 7-9 pm. Funeral Mass at Mary Manning Walsh Home, York Ave and 72 St, Wednesday, 9:30 am. Burial to follow at Gate of Heaven Cemetery, East Hanover, NJ.

Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave, at 81 St, Tuesday, 2-5 and 7-9 pm. Funeral Mass at Mary Manning Walsh Home, York Ave and 72 St, Wednesday, 9:30 am. Burial to follow at Gate of Heaven Cemetery, East Hanover, NJ.
